name: El Pansas
description:
2D pixel-art platformer/shooter based on Mexican folklore and ridiculous stereotypical jokes and innuendos, all in good fun!

Inspired by the great platformers and shooters from the Arcade era with comic relief.

You play as El Pansas which roughly translates to *"the big belly one". The term is normally used for big beer belly men in Mexico for having... you guessed it! Big bellies.

Go through levels and eliminate iconic joke-related enemies.
Collect Tequila bottles for power-ups.
Enjoy some crazy mix of Mariachi style music with Metal and even popular tunes while keeping that caliente flavor feel for the game.
